Title: Kedah Tourism Analytics Dashboard
Description: Interactive web platform analyzing real-time tourism data across Kedah state. Provides insights on visitor trends, transport routes, events, and sentiment through dynamic charts and geospatial maps, supporting data-driven decision-making for tourism stakeholders.
Features: Real-time visitor & social media engagement analytics
Interactive geospatial mapping with destinations and routes
Event attendance tracking and transport mode statistics
Sentiment analysis and dynamic location ranking

Title: AIU Booking Facilities System
Description: Full-stack web application for managing and booking facilities at AIU. Enables students and staff to reserve rooms, equipment, and venues with real-time availability tracking and automated approval workflows.
Features: Real-time facility availability and booking system
User authentication and role-based access control
